page.title: 13Home life contd.
page.content: 9.30a.m<contd>tidy clothes and arrange another load for the washer.Sweep porch and kitchen,rake boiler and fill with anthracite.Husband and oldest son begin to bring sheep into pen for dipping_help to turn sheep into yard. Telephone call long and involved about Sunday School meeting.Men call at door about potato picking. 10a.m.to 11a.m.neighbouring farmer comes_make him coffee while he looks at Saturdays Journal for Mart.prices. Husband comes in_make him coffee.Someone comes to the door to buy a bag of potatoes.Two more telephone calls in quick succession_take message to husband in yard.Sweep some more paths and hang out washing.Two more telephone calls.Another neighbour arrives to work together dipping sheep from both farms.
